title: CVS Health 's number of stores 2005 to 2018
summary: In 2018 , CVS Health 's had 9967 stores in the country , three fewer than in the previous Year .
The company had 9967 locations all across the country back in 2018 , however this figure has been falling ever since , with the sharpest drop recorded between 2011 and 2012 .

CVS Health 's CVS Health has had a patchy few years in terms of its profitability and reported a net loss of almost 125.5 million U.S. dollars in 2017 , followed by net income of just 3.77 million in 2018 2005 .
gold: This statistic depicts CVS Health 's number of stores from 2005 to 2018 . The CVS Health Corporation is a U.S. drug retailing company , with three major segments : Pharmacy Services , Retail/LTC , and Corporate . CVS Health is headquartered in Woonsocket , Rhode Island .
